Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Miniature tube-shaped vase with a flat circular bottom and a small slightly flared foot, misshapen and protruding from the exterior. The body is asymmetrical and slightly bulging. Forty-seven vessels of this type were found in the same foundation deposit.
